summary:
*Squid Game* is a popular South Korean TV show on Netflix. It's about a group of people who are struggling financially and take part in a secret, deadly game show. They play children's games but with a twistâ€”if they lose, they die! The title comes from a real Korean kids' game. The series was created by Hwang Dong-hyuk, who wanted to talk about money problems and the gap between rich and poor.

It became Netflix's most-watched show and won many awards, including Golden Globes and Emmys. The first season came out in 2021, and the second is coming in 2024.
title: Squid Game
